Welcome to PuMA’s documentation!¶

PuMA’s code can be found here. PuMA is also available through iMicrobe..

About PuMA¶

PuMA is a pipeline written in Python 3 for papillomavirus genome annotation. This pipline was created by utilizaing Biopython, BLAST, MEME, FIMO, MUSCLE. For more information on how PuMA works, refer to ‘How PuMA Works’.

Contents:¶

  • Usage via iMicrobe
  • Input File formatting
  • Output
  • How PuMA Works
  • License

Support¶

For any questions, please contact Dr. Koenraad Van Doorslaer at vandoorslaer@email.arizona.edu. Or visit the KVD Lab website.
